}

}"}';
    return Get('url') + '/api/query,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json"},"method":"POST"}';
}(key));

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

bookSourceComment:
永久站：
https://fuhouse.club/bl

ps：
删注释者减寿秃头倒大霉

使用指南：
若当前无法使用该源，原因有二
一、ip不对需切换网络
二、网站改新网址了

第一种情况 只需切换WIFI/流量/梯子即可
第二种情况 需按以下步骤操作
①复制永久站网址
②用浏览器打开该网址
③永久站网址会自动切换成可用网址
④复制当前可用网址
⑤将此源URL替换成复制的可用网址

注：
若两种情况都无法解决失效问题 
大概率网站改代码了 
随缘等人修复 主要看命

2022.7.10 酷安@乃星

bookSourceComment:
永久站A：https://shile.xyz/
永久站B：https://8fu.xyz/

ps：
删注释者减寿秃头倒大霉

使用指南：
若当前无法使用该源，原因有二
一、ip不对需切换网络
二、网站改新网址了

第一种情况 只需切换WIFI/流量/梯子即可
第二种情况 需按以下步骤操作
①复制永久站网址
②用浏览器打开该网址
③随机打开可用入口
④复制当前入口的网址
⑤将此源URL替换成复制的网址

注：
若两种情况都无法解决失效问题 
大概率网站改代码了 
随缘等人修复 主要看命
感谢关耳大大写的正文规则

2022.10.1 酷安@乃星

bookSourceComment:

.dht_dl_area@script@html
<js>
function reurl(a){var b='';var c=csplit(a,8).split('\r\n');for(var i=0;i<(c.length-1);i++){b=b+String.fromCharCode((parseInt(c[i],2)-10).toString(10))}return b}

function csplit(a,b,c){b=parseInt(b,10)||76;c=c||'\r\n';if(b<1){return false}return a.match(new RegExp(".{0,"+b+"}","g")).join(c)}

r=result.match(/(reurl[^)]+\))/)[1]
s=eval('('+r+')')
result="magnet:?xt=urn:btih:"+s
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
title = [
    '排行',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
orderby = [
    '/rank/',
    '/update/{{page}}/'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.4, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/search/';
var list = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url)).select('.filter-item.clearfix')[2].select('li');
OO = `{{get('oo',Get('o'))}}`;
PP = `{{get('pp',Get('p'))}}`;
QQ = `{{get('qq',Get('q'))}}`;
RR = `{{get('rr',Get('r'))}}`;
SS = `{{get('ss',Get('s'))}}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = i;
    var kind1 = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/\/list\//, '-').replace(/\/$/, '').replace(/^\-$/, '');
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/list/${OO}${PP}${kind1}${SS}${QQ}${RR}{{page}}/`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

headers={

    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

} else {

}

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var book = {
	name: o('h2').match(/《(.*)》.*/)[1],
	author: o('h2').match(/.*作者：(.*)首发.*/)[1],
	kind: o('.bookIntro p strong:eq(0)') + ',' + o('.bookIntro strong:eq(1)').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: o('h4 b').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + o('h4').match(/.*\((\d+-\d+-\d+)\).*/)[1],
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + o('h4').match(/.*\((\d+-\d+-\d+)\).*/)[1] + '\n' + o('#newIntro').replace(/\[ .*\]/, ''),
	cover: J.select('.bookPic img').attr('src'),
	url: J.select('.viewTool a:eq(0)').attr('href'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank1 = [
    '全部',
    '推荐',
    '热门',
    '上架'
];
orderby1 = [
    'manga',
    'hots',
    'dayup',
    'newss'
];
for (i in rank1) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${orderby1[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank1[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  地　　区  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank2 = [
    '韩漫',
    '国漫',
    '日漫',
    '欧美',
    '其他'
];
orderby2 = [
    'kr',
    'cn',
    'jp',
    'ou-mei',
    'qita',
];
for (i in rank2) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-genre/${orderby2[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank2[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '复仇','古风','奇幻','逆袭','异能','宅向','穿越','热血',
    '纯爱','系统','重生','冒险','灵异','大女主','剧情','恋爱',
    '玄幻','女神','科幻','魔幻','推理','猎奇','治愈','都市',
    '异形','青春','末日','悬疑','修仙','战斗'
];
link = [
    'fuchou','gufeng','qihuan','nixi','yineng','zhaixiang','chuanyue','rexue',
    'chunai','xitong','zhongsheng','maoxian','lingyi','danvzhu','juqing','lianai',
    'xuanhuan','nvshen','kehuan','mohuan','tuili','lieqi','zhiyu','doushi',
    'yixing','qingchun','mori','xuanyi','xiuxian','zhandou'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-tag/${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
    bytes.forEach(a => {
      bt = a & 0xff;
      if (bt < 16) {
        stringBuffer.append("0");
      }
      stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
    });
    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)
</js>$.[*]

bookSourceComment:
永久站：
https://fuhouse.club/bl
ps：
删注释者减寿秃头倒大霉
使用指南：
若当前无法使用该源，原因有二
一、ip不对需切换网络
二、网站改新网址了
第一种情况 只需切换WIFI/流量/梯子即可
第二种情况 需按以下步骤操作
①复制永久站网址
②用浏览器打开该网址
③永久站网址会自动切换成可用网址
④复制当前可用网址
⑤将此源URL替换成复制的可用网址
注：
若两种情况都无法解决问题 
大概率网站改代码了 
随缘等人修复 主要看命
2022.7.10 酷安@乃星

ruleContent.content: header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-asmh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic + chapter_domain +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//本地解密标志位
DEBUG = 0

{{source.bookSourceComment}}

// origin 
origin = source.getVariable()

// aes keys auto update
chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/)
if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) {
  cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1]))
}

// img_array
imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src)
.select(".content-img").toArray()
.map(v=>v.attr("data-r-src"))

if (DEBUG) imgs.splice(1)

imgs.toImg(null,
{headers:{origin:origin}}
	)

</js>

//java.log(result)
doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
$ = (a) => doc.select(a)
if (/function S2H/.test(result)) {
	function S2H(s){
        var r = [];
        for(var i=0;i<s.length/2;i++){
            r[r.length]= parseInt(s.substr(i*2,2), 16);
        }
        return r;
    }
    var str = S2H(String($('str').html()).replace(/\s/ig,''));
    var key = S2H(String(cookie.getKey(source.getKey(),'key')));
    var x = 0, ret = "";
    for(var i=0;i<str.length;i++){
        var d = (str[i] + key[x]);
        if(d>255)d=d%255;
        ret+='%'+('0'+d.toString(16)).substr(-2,2);
        x++; if(x>=key.length) x=0;
    }
    var html = decodeURIComponent(decodeURI(ret));
    $('str').html(html);
}
//java.log(doc)
doc;
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var path = 'comics/advanced-search?page=' + page;
    var body = `{"keyword":"${e}","sort":"${get('sort',Get('o'))}"}`;
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'POST') + ',"body":' + body + ',"method": "POST"}';
}(key));
</js>

<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
var Result = java.ajax(Get('url') + '/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&mobile=2');
let ck = cookie.getCookie(Get('url'));
if (ck.includes('auth=')) {
    var J= org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(Result);
    var user = J.select('.text-center')[1].text();
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), user);
} else {
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"),'');
}
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('auth=')) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('阅读记录', `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&type=lishi&page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Get('url')));
type = J.select('[data-field="category_id"]');
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Jindu = `{{get('jindu',Get('o'))}}`;
Shuxing = `{{get('shuxing',Get('p'))}}`;
Odfie = `{{get('odfie',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=ku${String('&category_id=' + type[j].attr('data-value')).replace(/&category_id=empty/, '')}${Jindu}${Shuxing}&odfie=${Odfie}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[j].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (java.ajax(Get('url')).includes(Account)) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("xxzf-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/favorite?tp=1-{{page}}&apimhstatus=all`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-topestmh-<,{{page}}>`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('排行', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-newest-<,{{page}}>`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('最新', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-cnxh-{{page}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('推荐', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var kind = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/home/book/cate.html')).select('.tagBtnClass');
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
P = `{{Get('p')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/cate/tp/1-${kind[i].attr('data-value')}-${P}-1-{{page}}-${Q}-1-${O}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].attr('data-value') + kind[i].select('span').text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '人气',
    '更新',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','机战','运动','推理','冒险','搞笑','战争',
    '神魔','忍者','竞技','悬疑','社会','恋爱','宠物','吸血',
    '萝莉','后宫','御姐','霸总','玄幻','古风','历史','漫改',
    '游戏','穿越','恐怖','真人','科幻','都市','武侠','修真',
    '生活','动作'
];
link = [
    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];
OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-collect/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18`, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
}
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=2`;

url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=4`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('新作', url2, 1, 0.2, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=5`;

title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';

for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&cateid=${kind[i].value}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].label, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {

}

                'url': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/get?id=' + list[i].mhid
            });
        }

        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.list;
        for (i in list) {
            var kinds = [];
            var kindElements = list[i].cateids ? list[i].cateids.split(',') : [];

                kinds.push(String(category[kindElements[j]-1].label));

                'url': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/get?id=' + list[i].id
            });
        }
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pageNo=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pageNo=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.list[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  分　　类  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '全部漫画',
    '最新上架'
];
orderby = [
    '/classify',
    '/list/new'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}?page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.45, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','恋爱','纯爱','古风','异能','悬疑','剧情','科幻',
    '奇幻','玄幻','穿越','冒险','推理','武侠','格斗','战争',
    '热血','搞笑','大女主','都市','总裁','后宫','日常','韩漫',
    '少年','其他'
];
type = [
    'type=all','type=lianai','type=chunai','type=gufeng','type=yineng','type=xuanyi','type=juqing','type=kehuan',
    'type=qihuan','type=xuanhuan','type=chuanyue','type=mouxian','type=tuili','type=wuxia','type=gedou','type=zhanzheng',
    'type=rexie','type=gaoxiao','type=danuzhu','type=dushi','type=zongcai','type=hougong','type=richang','type=hanman',
    'type=shaonian','type=qita'
];
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
Filter = `{{get('filter',Get('p'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/classify?${type[j]}${Region}${State}${Filter}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

            'author': String(list[i].select('.tags').text()).replace(/[,+]|[图文][:：]/g, '/').replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, '/').replace(/^[\/]/g, '').replace(/\|\//g, '').replace(/\s\/\s/g, '/').replace(/(\W)\s+|(\s+)(?=\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\/（/g, '（').replace(/:\//g, ':').replace(/作者:/g, ''),
            'kind': String(list[i].select('.tab').text()).replace(/\s/g, ','),
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': list[i].select('.comics-card__poster amp-img').attr('src'),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.comics-card__info').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.comics-card')).includes(String(list[0]))) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

var Link = '';

var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).response.body ? (JSON.parse(result).response.body.hits ? JSON.parse(result).response.body.hits.hits : JSON.parse(result).response.body.page_elements.collections.hits.hits) : [];
    for (i in list) {
        name = list[i].fields.title;
        var collections = [];
        var collectionElements = list[i].fields.collection;
        for (var j in collectionElements) {
            collections.push(String(collectionElements[j]));
        }
        collection = collections.join(',');
        if (list[i].fields.mediatype.includes('collection')) {
            author = '【默认合集】';
            if (collection.includes('texts')) {
                author = '【书籍合集】';
            } else if (collection.includes('movies')) {
                author = '【视频合集】';
            } else if (collection.includes('audio') || collection.includes('etree')) {
                author = '【音频合集】';
            } else if (collection.includes('image')) {
                author = '【图像合集】';
            } else {
                author = '【我的合集】';
            }
            kind = shortenNumber(list[i].fields.item_count || 0) + ' items' + ',' + formatBytes(list[i].fields.collection_size || 0) + ',collection' + ',' + collection;
            latest = '';
        } else {
            author = String(list[i].fields.creator).replace(/\,\s/g, '/').replace(/\,/g, '/').replace(/undefined/g, '');
            kind = String('✦ ' + shortenNumber(list[i].fields.downloads || 0) + ',' + '♥ ' + shortenNumber(list[i].fields.num_favorites || 0) + ',' + String(list[i].fields.mediatype).replace(/etree/, 'music') + ',' + list[i].fields.language + ',' + list[i].fields.year).replace(/undefined/g, '').replace(/✦\s\,/, '✦ 0,').replace(/♥\s\,/, '♥ 0,');
            latest = 'Addeddate: ' + String(list[i].fields.addeddate).replace(/T/, ' ').replace(/Z/, '');
        }
        intro = String(list[i].fields.description).replace(/undefined/g, '');
        cover = decodeURIComponent(Get('url') + '/services/img/' + list[i].fields.identifier);
        url = decodeURIComponent(Get('url') + '/details/' + list[i].fields.identifier);
        cache.put('Type' + url, list[i].fields.mediatype);
        cache.put('Identifier' + url, list[i].fields.identifier);
        cache.put('Name' + url, name);
        cache.put('Author' + url, author);
        cache.put('Kind' + url, kind);
        cache.put('Cover' + url, cover);
        cache.put('Intro' + url, intro);
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': cover,
            'url': url
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/&page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return '&page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var nextlist = JSON.parse(next).response.body ? (JSON.parse(next).response.body.hits ? JSON.parse(next).response.body.hits.hits : JSON.parse(next).response.body.page_elements.collections.hits.hits) : [];
    if (!list[0] || !nextlist[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
data = JSON.parse(result).data;
JSON.stringify({
	  "name": String(decode(data.Name)),
	  "author": String(decode(data.Author)),
	  "img": String(data.Img),
	  "desc": String(decode(data.Desc)),
	  "time": String(data.LastTime),
	  "new": String(data.LastChapter),
	  "kind": String(data.CName)+","+String(data.BookStatus),
	})
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
var list = [];
JSON.parse(result).data.BookList.forEach(str=>{
	list.push({
		"Name":decode(str.Name),
		"Author":decode(str.Author),
		"Img":str.Img,
		"CName":decode(str.CName)+","+str.Score+"分",
		"Desc":decode(str.Desc),
		"Id":str.Id
		})
	})
JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$.*

    return style;

JSON.stringify(headers);

    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {

    top += 1;
    cookie.setCookie(baseUrl, `${ck};_va=13;__na=${na};top_banner_counter_1500=${top}`);
    var list = java.getElements('.fed-list-item||.fed-deta-info');

        name = list[i].select('.fed-font-xvi.fed-part-eone').text();
        a = String(list[i].select('.fed-part-rows li')[0].text()).indexOf('别名') == -1 ? '1' : '0';
        author = String(list[i].select('.fed-part-rows li')[4-a].textNodes()[0]).replace(/.*[:：]/, "").replace(/\+\s/g, '/').replace(/[,，+&]/g, '/').replace(/(\W)\s+|(\s+)(?=\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\/x\//g, '/').replace(/amp|;/g, '').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')');
        kind = String(list[i].select('.fed-part-rows li')[3-a].textNodes()[0]).replace(/[中已]/, "") + ',' + String(list[i].select('.fed-col-md6 a').text()).replace(/\s/g, ',');
        latest = list[i].select('.fed-list-remarks').text() + '〔' + String(list[i].select('.fed-part-rows li')[5-a].textNodes()[0]) + '〕';
        intro = list[i].select('.fed-part-esan').textNodes()[0];
        cover = list[i].select('.fed-list-pics').attr('data-original');
        cache.put('Cover' + Get('url') + list[i].select('.fed-part-eone a').attr('href'), cover);
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.fed-part-eone a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    var searchkey = java.get(Get('url') + "searchkey");
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.fed-list-item, .fed-deta-info')[0] || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '推荐',
    '最新',
    '热门'
];
orderby = [
    'ranks?date_type=total&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=month&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=week&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=day&_update=true',
    'recs?pos=3200102',
    'comics?ordering=-datetime_updated',
    'comics?ordering=-popular'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v3/${orderby[i]}&limit=24&offset={{24*(page-1)}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','爱情','欢乐向','冒险','奇幻','百合','校园','科幻',
    '东方','耽美','生活','格斗','轻小说','悬疑','神鬼','职场',
    'TL','萌系','治愈','长条','四格','节操','舰娘','竞技',
    '搞笑','伪娘','热血','励志','性转换','彩色','后宫','美食',
    '侦探','AA','音乐舞蹈','魔幻','战争','历史','异世界','惊悚',
    '机战','都市','穿越','恐怖','C100','重生','C99','C101',
    'C97','C96','生存','宅系','武侠','C98','C95','FATE',
    '转生','无修正','仙侠','LoveLive','其他'
];
theme = [
    '','&theme=aiqing','&theme=huanlexiang','&theme=maoxian','&theme=qihuan','&theme=baihe','&theme=xiaoyuan','&theme=kehuan',
    '&theme=dongfang','&theme=danmei','&theme=shenghuo','&theme=gedou','&theme=qingxiaoshuo','&theme=xuanyi','&theme=shengui','&theme=zhichang',
    '&theme=teenslove','&theme=mengxi','&theme=zhiyu','&theme=changtiao','&theme=sige','&theme=jiecao','&theme=jianniang','&theme=jingji',
    '&theme=gaoxiao','&theme=weiniang','&theme=rexue','&theme=lizhi','&theme=xingzhuanhuan','&theme=COLOR','&theme=hougong','&theme=meishi',
    '&theme=zhentan','&theme=aa','&theme=yinyuewudao','&theme=mohuan','&theme=zhanzheng','&theme=lishi','&theme=yishijie','&theme=jingsong',
    '&theme=jizhan','&theme=dushi','&theme=chuanyue','&theme=kongbu','&theme=comiket100','&theme=chongsheng','&theme=comiket99','&theme=comiket101',
    '&theme=comiket97','&theme=comiket96','&theme=shengcun','&theme=zhaixi','&theme=wuxia','&theme=comiket98','&theme=comiket95','&theme=fate',
    '&theme=zhuansheng','&theme=Uncensored','&theme=xianxia','&theme=loveLive','&theme=qita'
];
Ordering = `{{get('ordering',Get('p'))}}`;
Top = `{{get('top',Get('o'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v3/comics${Ordering}${Top}${theme[j]}&limit=24&offset={{24*(page-1)}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  更　　新  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '周一',
    '周二',
    '周三',
    '周四',
    '周五',
    '周六',
    '周日'
];
orderby = [
    '1',
    '2',
    '3',
    '4',
    '5',
    '6',
    '7'
];
Gengxin = `{{get('gengxin',Get('ci0'))}}`;
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${Gengxin}/${orderby[i]}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (rank.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (rank.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','长条','大女主','百合','耽美','纯爱','後宫','韩漫',
    '奇幻','轻小说','生活','悬疑','格斗','搞笑','伪娘','竞技',
    '职场','萌系','冒险','治愈','都市','霸总','神鬼','侦探',
    '爱情','古风','欢乐向','科幻','穿越','性转换','校园','美食',
    '剧情','热血','节操','励志','异世界','历史','战争','恐怖'
];
Shudan = `{{get('shudan',Get('ci0'))}}`;
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${Shudan}/${Region}/${kind[j]}/${State}/{{page}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID1 = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID1; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}

var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
link = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
Area = `{{get('area',Get('o'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=${link[j]}&area=${Area}&end=${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/api/rank/0-0-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/latest/{{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, 0.4, false));
}
title1 = [
    '韩国','完结','连载','更新',
    '日本','完结','连载','更新'
];
url1 = [
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-2-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-1-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-2-1-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-2-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-1-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-3-1-{{page}}`'
];
for (i in title1) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title1[i], eval(url1[i]), 1, 0.2, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
type = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版漫画',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

<js>
result=result.replace(/onclick="payChapter\('(.*?)','.*?',.*?\);"/g,'href="$1"');
doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
list=doc.select("#episodes a,#extra_episodes a");
if(String(list).match(/class="price_tag_icon">￥/)){
result=list
}else{
list=doc.select("#episodes a");
list2=doc.select("#extra_episodes a");
a=list.toArray().reverse().map(x=>({text:x.text(),
href:x.attr('href')}));
b=list2.toArray().map(x=>({text:x.text(),
href:x.attr('href')}));
result=a.concat(b)
}</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','日常','其它','纯爱','推理',
    '奇幻','格斗','大女主','剧情','总裁','武侠','异能','少年',
    '韩漫'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/54','/tags/55','/tags/56','/tags/57','/tags/58','/tags/59','/tags/60',
    '/tags/61'
];
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/category/list/${O}/finish/${Q}/order/${Order}${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(50, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','爱情','武侠','格斗','侦探',
    '推理','剧情','其它','总裁','奇幻','韩漫','纯爱','日常',
    '少年','大女主','异能'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/294','/tags/295','/tags/296','/tags/297','/tags/298','/tags/299','/tags/300',
    '/tags/301','/tags/302','/tags/303'
];
order = [
    'hits',
    'addtime'
];
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/category/list/${O}/finish/${Q}/order/${Order}${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}

var Title = '';
var Link = '';

};

        name = list[i].select('.comic__title').text();
        kind = String(list[i].select('.comic-count').text()).replace(/人气：/g, '✦ ');
        latest = list[i].select('.comic-update a').text();
        intro = list[i].select('.comic-feature').text();
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': '',
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': list[i].select('.cover img').attr('data-original'),
            'url': list[i].select('a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    if (String(java.getElements('.search_head')).includes('您搜索的内容暂时没有找到')) {
        Data();
    } else {
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page\/(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page/' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        var searchkey = java.get(Get('url') + "searchkey");
        if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.common-comic-item')[0] || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
var a = 0;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('username')) {
        Login();
    }
    java.put("mw-sign", cache.get("mw-sign"));
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) { 
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("mw-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/getfavors?page={{page-1}}&showOnlyUpdated=-1&isEnd=-1&isFullVersion=-1&order=0&order_type=0&folder_id=0`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url')}}/getHistory?page={{page-1}}&showOnlyUpdated=-1&isEnd=-1&isFullVersion=-1`, 1, 0.25, false));
        a = 4;
    }
}
Full = `{{get('full',Get('s'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
Host = `{{Get('p')}}`;
if(Get('t') > 0) {
    title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
    Gender = get('gender',Get('o'));
    Area = `{{get('area',Get('u'))}}`;
    Sort = `{{get('sort',Get('v'))}}`;
    var Url = Get('url') + '/booklist?gender=' + Gender;
    var html = java.ajax(Url);
    if(html.includes('html.js')){
        cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
        html = java.startBrowserAwait(Url,"验证").body();
    }
    var kind = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('.panel-tag');
    for (i in kind) {
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${kind[i].attr('data-val')}&gender=${Gender}${Full}${End}&area=${Area}&sort=${Sort}&img_host=${Host}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
    for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
       exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
    }
} else {
    title = [
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫'
    ];
    type = [
        '&area=2&sort=-1',
        '&area=2&sort=0',
        '&area=2&sort=1',
        '&area=2&sort=2',
        '&area=3&sort=-1',
        '&area=3&sort=0',
        '&area=3&sort=1',
        '&area=3&sort=2',
        '&area=4&sort=-1',
        '&area=4&sort=0',
        '&area=4&sort=1',
        '&area=4&sort=2',
        '&area=5&sort=-1',
        '&area=5&sort=0',
        '&area=5&sort=1',
        '&area=5&sort=2',
        '&area=6&sort=-1',
        '&area=6&sort=0',
        '&area=6&sort=1',
        '&area=6&sort=2',
        '&area=1&sort=-1',
        '&area=1&sort=0',
        '&area=1&sort=1',
        '&area=1&sort=2'
    ];
    Gender = `{{get('gender',Get('o'))}}`;
    for (i in title) {
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?gender=${Gender}${Full}${End}${type[i]}&img_host=${Host}&page={{page}}`;
        exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    exploreUrl.splice(0+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨韩国✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(5+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨日漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(10+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨国漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(15+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨台漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(20+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨其他✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(25+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨未分类✨ 　　   ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '最近更新',
    '新书发布',
    '推荐漫画'
];
orderby = [
    '/ranking/all',
    '/ranking/monthly',
    '/ranking/weekly',
    '/ranking/daily',
    '/update',
    '/update/newbook',
    '/update/recommend'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版','肉欲','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之妇','女大生','狗血剧','同居','好友','调教','动作','后宫',
    '不伦','3D','校园','耽美','日漫'
];
link = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版漫画','肉慾','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之婦','女大生','狗血劇','同居','好友','調教','动作','後宮',
    '不倫','3D','校園','耽美','日漫'
];
Ob = `{{get('ob',Get('p'))}}`;
St = `{{get('st',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics/${link[j]}/ob/${Ob}/st/${St}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行榜',
    '连载中',
    '已完结'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/top.html`',
    '`${host}/weekly/?page={{page}}`',
    '`${host}/complete/?page={{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, -1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '韩国',
    '连载',
    '完结',
    '日本',
    '连载',
    '完结'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画'
];
end = [
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1',
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1'
];
for (i in title) {
    url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}&area=1&end=${end[i]}`;
    url2 = '&page={{page}}';
    url = url1 +url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=全部&area=-1&end=`;
url2 = '&page={{page}}';
title = [
    '全部',
    '完结'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = url1 + i + url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, -1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

headers={

    "Referer": Get('url'),
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

ruleContent.content: header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-aym.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic." var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic + chapter_domain +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += ''; } result = html

ruleBookInfo.author: $.response.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.response.posts[0].post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header))
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.response.collection.name

ruleContent.content: content = java.getString("$..content"); imgs = eval(String(java.getString("$..photoLinks"))); video = "" if(/\.mp4/.test(baseUrl)){ video = "请点击章节链接观看视频\n视频链接："+baseUrl } img = ""; imgs?imgs.forEach(x=>{ x?img += "\n":"" }):"" result = content + "\n"+img + video;
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
try{
		id = java.getString("$..post.id");
		id2 = java.getString("$..post.blogId");
url ="https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/post/newSupportInfo?postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2+"&openFansVipPlan=0&vipFans=0"
	$  = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(url)));
	l = $.data.gainReturnGifts;
	ls = []
	l.forEach(x=>{
		url = "https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/myReturnGift?id="+x.id+"&postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2;
		ls.push(url)
		})
	result = ls
	}catch(e){
		}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleBookInfo.author: class.detail-main-info-author.1@a@text
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
// origin 
origin = baseUrl.match(/(https.{3,4}[^\/]+)\//)[1]
source.setVariable(origin)


src
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: class.detail-main-info-title@text

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//本地解密标志位
DEBUG = 0

{{source.bookSourceComment}}

// origin 
origin = source.getVariable()

// aes keys auto update
chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/)
if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) {
  cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1]))
}

// img_array
imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src)
.select(".content-img").toArray()
.map(v=>v.attr("data-r-src"))

if (DEBUG) imgs.splice(1)

imgs.toImg(null,
{headers:{origin:origin}}
	)

</js>
